body_html:
@ezyang I wasn't notified of the mention for some reason.
Yes, once the IR export / import PR goes in, the intention was to start looking into master-worker. I'm currently working on something conceptually related (a GRPC remote tensor runtime that can load serialized IR's) so it makes sense to get into master-worker as well. With my pace, as usual ;-)

body:
@ezyang I wasn't notified of the mention for some reason.
Yes, once the IR export / import PR goes in, the intention was to start looking into master-worker. I'm currently working on something conceptually related (a GRPC remote tensor runtime that can load serialized IR's) so it makes sense to get into master-worker as well. With my pace, as usual ;-)
